name: Unicards
description:
Unicards is a new and minimalistic puzzle game with a twist. Easy to learn and hard to master!

The rules are simple: Match 3 or more cards of the same color horizontal, vertical or in L shape. Reach the highest score and highest card and compete with your friends and others on the leaderboard.

Featuring eye pleasing graphics and ear pleasing sound, it's a game that everyone can enjoy!
